author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Recently Steven Deobald put out a piece on recurring donations, and whilst it doesn't have the best name the point it's making is really good, moving away from lump sum donations to more recurring donations.

title: Every FOSS Project Wants More Stable Funding
